medical_history.chief_complaint: Central abdominal pain described as crampy and dull.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began yesterday and progressed in intensity overnight as the pain migrated to the left upper quadrant (LUQ). No fever, + subjective chills, mild nausea, no emesis. Stooled this morning, looser-than-normal without melena nor hematochezia.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroid, depression, migraines, laparoscopic cholecystectomy, biliary colic, neurosurgery procedure for astrocytoma.
medical_history.family_history: Celiac disease (sister), colon cancer (grandfather), Alzheimer's, osteoarthritis.
